dailyFunStuff.title: 10-year-old runs charity for at-risk children
dailyFunStuff.content:
10-year old Chelsea Phaire started her own charity in 2019 (with help from her parents) to provide art supplies to more than 1500 kids in foster care and homeless shelters.

Read more about her amazing contributions below!

citation.name: 10-Year-old Gives the Gift of Art to More Than 1,500 Kids in Shelters and Foster Care During Quarantine - Good News Network
